# adaptedAsEstimator()

**Instance Method**

Exposes this tabular transformer as a trivial tabular estimator.

## Declaration

```swift
func adaptedAsEstimator() -> TabularTransformerToEstimatorAdaptor<Self>
```

## Adapting

- **adaptedAsUpdatableEstimator()**: Exposes this tabular transformer as an updatable tabular estimator.
